title: Will they have winter skins this december?
body: I was wondering if they would have skins like Winter wonder lulu on sale during this chritmas season.

replies.body: Yup! Legacy Snowdown skins will make a return!

Excuse Katey (if I'm allowed to call you that) since you're here,may I ask you a question?

Care to comment on the lack of Christmas-y skins over the last few years?There have been only Winter/snow theme skins;no Santa,presents or Christmas trees skins.I mean,Santa Bard would have been just as good of a skin to do as Snow day Bard.Any idea why Riot made Christmas skins in there early days,yet don't any more?
Is it because not everyone celebrates Christmas & Winter/snow is more appealing?In other words,you guys are thinking about your non-Christmas-celebrating players around the world.
I guess you could say the same for Halloween/Harrowing/whatever you call that October event a few weeks ago.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=g3PyycOi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-09T01:38:53.082+0000)
>
> Yup! Legacy Snowdown skins will make a return!

Would you happen to know which skins will be returning? Is it just specific past Snowdown skins or all of them?
It should be all of the previous Snowdown skins - Candy Cane Miss Fortune, Snow Day Malzahar, etc.
it will be delayed to january, just like the halloween skins being in november
